fields.name: Operation
fields.def: Defines What Operation the packet is requesting

options.result: Sender:Computer  --Instructs MicroController to Reset state to default
SetMem:Dual  --Sets A given memory Address to a given Value (setting following addresses if provided). Returns error if invalid address outside of purview
Sender:Dual  --Gets the Memory at a given address and given length Entire range must be valid memory
Sender:Dual  --This is the return for a given `command` Returns packet cmd,cmdNumber,status

fields.name: Data Size
fields.def: This is the number of bytes of data to expect following this header
